subject: The French connection!?---Qui!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I tried to join a French yahoo group for ITC, but I didn't speak 
French so they kicked me off. I wanted to try to share what we are 
doing internationally, but the group owner speaks English, and said 
he'll take the information, and translate it for the group, if it's 
meaningful.

 "transcommunication_france-reject-
vR6aDdm0JJMkAlxpHHAMc6A@yahoogroups.com"

 Frank
